name: Wide Drum Patchwork Petal Cream
description:
A beautiful unique wide drum lampshade on a slender turned wood base, perfect for modern folk with a vintage twist

The larger version of my patchwork design which works wonders in the living room or as pretty bedside lights. Screenprinted by hand with a mosaic inspired petal design, topped with machine stitched detail, making each lampshade truly individual.

This is modern style table lamp with a hint of country rose.

As a lampshade on its own this Wide Drum shade would suit small to medium sized rooms with low to average ceiling height.

If you are looking for a deeper shade as a pendant then the Tub Drum is available for £49 - same width but more height.

The lamp holder fits the larger continental style lamp bases (Ikea / Habitat) and also comes with a reducer ring for standard UK lamp fittings and pendants.

With the base you can choose from beech with a natural or wenge (dark brown) finish.

Also available in a smaller drum and larger tub drum version and as a tube light - please see our related products.

All our lampshades and bases are made and wired in the UK.

Made from:
Printed in opaque cream, solvent free ink onto translucent laminated paper.

Dimensions:
Wide Drum Shade - W: 23cm H: 15cm Max 60W/E14
Base H: 35cm Total H: 50cm

name: Wide Drum Ripple Cream
description:
An original table lamp with plenty of character. A rippling pattern on a cylinder style lampshade with a simple turned wooden base.

Perfect on a side table in the living room or as a bold pair of bedside lights in the master bedroom. A creamy opaque pattern, screenprinted by hand in my London studio. Topped with machine stitched detail, making each lampshade truly individual.

Has plenty of retro charm and makes a perfect gift for any Mid Century Modern fans!

As a lampshade on its own this Wide Drum shade would suit small to medium sized rooms with low to average ceiling height.

The lamp holder fits the larger continental style lamp bases (Ikea / Habitat) and also comes with a reducer ring for standard UK lamp fittings and pendants.

With the base you can choose from turned beech with a natural or wenge (dark brown) finish. See separate listing.

Also available in a smaller drum version

All our lampshades and bases are made and wired in the UK.

Hand printed in opaque cream, solvent free ink onto translucent laminated paper. (Imagine reinforced white tissue paper which has a beautiful diffused glow once lit)

Shade Dimensions:
Wide Drum Shade - W: 23cm H: 15cm Max 60W/E14

Base H: 35cm

Total Lamp H: 50cm

name: Wide Drum Long Leaf Cream
description:
pre-order for 4 weeks delivery (w/c 16th Dec)

A lovely, elegant design which has simple flowing lines of leaves running around the shade.
The print is an opaque cream which forms a shadowy silhouette when the shade is lit. Tiny pin pricks of machine embroidery add an extra sparkle.
I originally did a simple leaf design for Heal's of London and this has been part of my classic range ever since.
Screen printed by hand in my studio using waterbased inks onto a translucent, laminated, parchment paper.
Shade Measures: Diameter 9" x 6" High / 23cm x 15cm

As seen here on one of my simple turned wooden bases.
Size Tall

The height of the shade and base is 20" / 50cm

The fitting for the lamp holder is inset 1.5" from base of the shade where the stem part of print is.
Has a dual E14/E27 fitting depending on your lamp base fittings. I can email photos if you need more info.
Please note if you wanted to have it as a pendant shade, the leaves will be upside down.

description:

name: Cone Lampshade - Long Leaf Cream
description:
A lovely, elegant design which has simple flowing lines of leaves running around the shade.

Perfect as bedside lights or narrow spaces

The print is an opaque cream which forms a shadowy silhouette when the shade is lit. Tiny pin pricks of machine embroidery add an extra sparkle.
To give an idea of the contrasting effects, the second photo is a close up of the shade when lit, the third photo is with the light off.

Screen printed by hand in my studio using waterbased inks onto a translucent, laminated paper.

Shade Measures: Diameter 6" x 10" High / 15cm x 25cm


The height of the shade and base is approx. 24" / 60cm - see my base listings to purchase the matching tall base.

The base is made from simple turned beach in either natural or wenge finish.

name: No. 7 Drum Moroccan Tile
description:
Moroccan Tile is proving to be a very popular choice so I've added a smaller version ideal for table lamps - perfect for living rooms, narrow spaces or as elegant bedside lights.
As a pendant, this size is great for hallways or small rooms with low to average height ceilings.
Screen printed by hand in white opaque print onto translucent laminated paper.  Individual freehand machine stitching follows the pattern, adding a delicate shimmer of detail once lit.
Available in white and turquoise.

This listing is for the shade - the tall base can be purchased separately from my shop.

Shade: W: 18cm H: 20cm
Max 60W/E14

Base H: 35
Total H: 55cm
Shade Price: £39
Base Price: £46
Total Price: £85

If you require a base, please see the tall base listings here:
http://www.helenrawlinson.bigcartel.com/product/tall-lamp-base

name: No. 7 Long drum - Sunset Strip
description:
A slender, thirties style lampshade, a great pendant light for hallways or narrow spaces. Screenprinted by hand with individual machine stitched detail.

With a nostalgic look at New York, sunsets and lofty towers, this retro shade shimmers with Art Deco style and its opaque white print sits well with most colour schemes. Screen printed by hand on to laminated paper with machine stitched dotted detail, it adds a touch of 1930s glamour to those dark hallways.

The extra tall base is available to purchase for an additional £66. A beautifully simple, turned cone in beech wood, natural or dark wenge finish.
This makes a stunningly tall table lamp, an elegant gift for a wedding present or special birthday.

Has an inline switch on the black flex for easy access.

Both the lampshade and base are made, wired and tested in the UK.

Made from:
The sunset lampshade is made from laminated fine paper, screenprinted with waterbased ink.

Dust occasionally with a soft dry cloth.

Dimensions:
Shade: W: 18cm H: 30cm Max 60W/E14
Lamp Base H: 40cm Total with Shade H: 70cm Max 40w or low energy - SES small screw type fitting

name: Small Lamp Base
description:
A simple turned beech base, made in the UK and designed to match the proportions of the Small Drum Shades.
Base Height: 25cm
Available in natural or a dark wenge finish.
Lamp bases are currently only supplied with a UK plug.
2 core flex with an inline switch. 
E14 lamp holder 
SES screw fitting
Max 40watt with Small Drum Shade
Ikea now do low energy SES bulbs!

name: Tall Lamp Base
description:
A simple turned beech base, made in the UK and designed to match the proportions of the Wide Drum Shades, the Cone Shades and the No. 7 drum Shades (not the No. 7 long - the extra tall bases are better for this size)

Available here in natural or a dark wenge finish.
Slight seconds also available with very minor dents/marks/scratches at £30

Base Height: 35cm
Lamp bases are currently only supplied with a UK plug.
2 core flex with an inline switch. 
E14 lamp holder 
SES screw fitting
Max 60 watt with Wide Drum Shade
Ikea now do low energy SES bulbs!

name: Extra Tall Base
description:
A simple turned beech base, made in the UK and designed to match the proportions of the Large Drum, Tub Drum and No. 7 Long Drum Shades.
Available in natural or a dark wenge finish.
Base Height: 40cm
Lamp bases are currently only supplied with a UK plug.
2 core flex with an inline switch. 
E14 lamp holder 
SES screw fitting
Max 60watt 

*Slight Seconds*
I have a few slight second bases available in the extra tall at £35 - they have small dents/scratches that have occurred in transit. The marks are really not very noticeable but classed as seconds for this reason and don't pass my strict quality control!
Please note that the seconds are non-returnable.

name: Tube Light Patchwork Petal in White
description:
A mosaic of petals dance around this new tube light.  No base needed and great for gloomy corners, bookshelves or bedsides.

Screen printed by hand in cool white. 
Dotted stitched detail follows the curves for that added sparkle!

Weighted at the bottom, these stand well as lights in their own right.

Shade: W: 13cm H: 30cm
Max 40W bayonet fitting with an inline switch on white flex
Ideal for low energy bulbs

name: Tube Light Sunset Strip in White
description:
Sunset strip is an easy modern design and looks super fine as a new tube light.  No base needed and great for gloomy corners, bookshelves or bedsides.

Screen printed by hand in cool white. 
Dotted stitched detail surrounds the sunsets for that extra sparkle!

Weighted at the bottom, these stand well as lights in their own right.

Shade: W: 13cm H: 30cm
Max 40W bayonet fitting with an inline switch on white flex
Ideal for low energy bulbs

Also available in the taller 40cm size.

name: Tall Tube Light Big Flower in White
description:
Super elegant big flower as a new tube light.  No base needed and great for narrow spaces, bookshelves or bedsides.

White print on to translucent laminated paper. 
Dotted stitched detail surrounds the shapes for an extra sparkle!

Weighted at the bottom for a sturdy lamp.

Shade: W: 13cm H: 40cm
Max 40W bayonet fitting with an inline switch on white flex
Ideal for low energy bulbs

Can be fitted with a euro or US plug.

Pattern placement may vary with each shade.

name: Rock Slim Cushion
description:
A super bold print of undulating rocks.
Hand screen printed using water based, solvent free inks on to half panama strong unbleached cotton. 
A great shape for arm chairs and as a lumbar support.
Comes complete with polyfil pad (UK only)

The orange has a plain cotton back.
The turquoise is backed with a yellow Designer's Guild linen.
Concealed side zip at the base.

Due to the nature of hand pulled prints, the printed surface may vary slightly which is only natural in this process and part of it’s charm.

Dry clean or gentle handwash only.

Measures 22" x 11" / 56 x 28cm.

***This is a made to order item. Please allow 7 to 14 days prior to postage.***Hand Prints by Helen Rawlinson in the UK.

name: Retro Block Print Cushion
description:
A gorgeous bold rectangular cushion screen printed with a retro modern block design.

These beautiful printed cushions are a perfect compliment to my lighting collection. Their modern shape and retro design make an easy choice for any contemporary home with a vintage twist.

Makes a lovely house warming gift.

This is a made to order item. Please allow 7 to 14 days prior to postage.

Due to the nature of hand pulled prints, the printed surface may vary slightly which is only natural in this process and part of it’s charm. I am however attentive to detail and aim to keep standards high.

Choose from Mulberry, Orange, Royal Blue or Olive

I can also screenprint other colours from my print range, just send me a message.

Mix and match with design and colour for a vibrant contemporary collection. See the Parade cushions in my product range to purchase the other design, (as seen in the group photo)

Printed by hand using water based inks. Has a concealed side zip. Plain reverse.

100% unbleached half panama cotton: Gentle hand wash only

Measures 43 x 33cm (17 x 13ins).
Comes with a polyfil pad

Great for both vintage and modern sofas and settees!

name: Lollipop Cushion
description:
Hand screen print cushion with a lovely lollipop flower. A retro style print in a choice of colours.

This fresh and fun design would make a great wedding or house warming gift

Printed by hand in our London studio using solvent free inks.

Plain reverse.
Comes with a feather filled pad

Has a concealed side zip opening.

Please note that for delivery outside UK the pillow inserts are not included.

Choose from cherry red, dark mushroom, blue/grey or olive. Other colours available on request.
Made to order item - please allow 7 to 14 days prior to dispatch.

Made from:
100% unbleached half panama cotton.

Gentle hand wash or dry clean only.

Dimensions:
14" / 35.6 cm square

name: Big Flower Retro Print Cushion
description:
Big retro flowers dance across this vintage style screenprint cushion.

Made to order, please allow 7 to 14 days prior to posting.

Hand screen printed by me in our London studio using solvent free inks.

Has a concealed side zip. Plain reverse.

Please note that for delivery outside UK the pillow inserts are not available to purchase.

As the repeat of this pattern is quite large, the design placement may vary across each cushion.

Currently available in a smokey dark mushroom. Other colours available on request.

Made from:
100% unbleached half panama cotton

Dimensions:
14" / 35.6 cm cushion cover.

name: Moroccan Tile Slim Cushion
description:
A super slim cushion in a wonderful Moroccan print. A perfect width for armchairs and great lumbar support. Moorish in style with a modern twist.

Hand screen printed and made by me in my London studio using water based, solvent free inks.

Has a concealed side zip running along the length.
Plain reverse. Includes a poly fil pad (optional)

***This is a made to order item. Please allow 7 to 14 days prior to postage.***Hand Prints by Helen Rawlinson in the UK.

Due to the nature of hand pulled prints, the printed surface may vary slightly which is only natural in this process and part of it’s charm.

Dry clean or gentle handwash only.
Available in fresh aqua, cherry red, elephant grey or royal blue.

The fabric is a lovely strong, 100% unbleached half panama cotton.
Comes with a polfil pad.

Measures 22" x 11" / 56 x 28cm.

name: Parade Cushion
description:
Flowers on 'Parade' Measures 43 x 33cm(17 x 13ins). Great for sofas and setees!

Vibrant orange, big and bold or deep warm mulberry. Now also available in Royal Blue and Olive.

***This is a made to order item. Please allow 7 to 14 days prior to postage.***

Printed by hand using water based inks. Has a concealed side zip. Plain reverse.

Unbleached half panama cotton
Gentle handwash or dry clean only
Polyfil pad included.

All fabrics are hand screen printed by me in my London studio.

Due to the nature of hand pulled prints, the printed surface may vary slightly which is only natural in this process and part of it’s charm. I am however attentive to detail and aim to keep standards high.

I try and keep packaging to a minimum and use recycled and biodegradable packaging wherever possible.

name: With Love Gift Tag Bags
description:
Send 'With Love' mini bags to make gift giving super special this Valentine's. Screenprinted by hand 100% cotton bags

Save on all the paperie this Valentine's and choose these little eco friendly bags instead. Perfect for filling with something extra special for your loved one. Screenprinted by hand in our London studio using solvent free inks onto 100% cotton. Makes a lovely keepsake for special memories and souvenirs.

With Love Gift Tag design: Choose from a snowy white print on a red cotton bag or red print on a natural cotton bag.

Made from:
100% cotton. The fabric weight is 140 GSM, approx 5oz.

Hand wash only. May shrink a little after washing

Dimensions:
21cm (w) x 26cm (h) with short handles.

name: Just Married Personalised Cushion
description:
A lovely bright screenprint 'Just Married' cushion, complete with a personalised embroidered message to give as a special keepsake for a wedding.

A super souvenir for the happy couple's special day. A real statement pillow to take pride of place in the bedroom or show off in the back of the newly weds' car!

Screen printed by hand onto a soft white organic cotton with the words 'Just Married' enclosed in a big red love heart.

Adding a personalised message will be a happy reminder for the bride and groom in years to come.

There's even a little woven tag to the side which reads '...to have and to hold...'

The personalised message is machine embroidered with your requested names, dates and place on the reverse. (Plain reverse option also available)

Please write your description exactly as you want it to be in the message option when purchasing. Type * between any words if you want an embroidered heart added anywhere.
eg. Helen & Nigel got hitched * London * 22/09/12 Hip Hip Hurray!
Write & or and - eg. John and Claire got hitched or John & Claire got hitched. If writing the date as numbers - it will be sewn as 04/07/12 rather than 04.07.12 otherwise the date can be written in full eg. 4th July 2012. Please note that mistakes can not be rectified once dispatched.

Size of lettering will vary according to number of words, for example: the more words used, the smaller the text will be in order to fit across the pillow. I am happy to write whatever text you like as long as it is no more than 60 characters.

Your gift will be packaged in a clear cellophane wrap with red curly ribbon and a heart print, manilla tag ready for your own special message.

Now you can add a large 'Just Married' Shopper to pop your cushion inside. Available here at the special price of £12 and free delivery - see the related tote bag listing for more details.

Made from:
100% organic cotton fabric. Has an invisible zip closure. Gentle hand wash only. May shrink a little on first wash.

Polyfil pad included.

Makes a 43 x 33cm(17 x 13ins) rectangular cushion.

Made to order - please allow 7 to 14 days prior to posting. If you need it for a specific date please let me know.

name: Just Married Honeymoon Tote
description:
A loud and proud shopper tote bag with a beautifully bold, red heart screenprinted by hand with the words 'Just Married' emblazened across the front.

A perfectly fun gift for the newly weds. A great big canvas tote bag which shouts out the celebration of a very special day!

This super big tote doubles as neat packaging for a wedding gift, then comes in very handy for the honeymoon to follow. A lovely strong shopper that can be filled with everything a happy couple needs for the beach or just to stuff with lots of wedding memorabelia and hang proudly at home as a top souvenir!

Makes a very eco friendly alternative to traditional gift wrap that's sure to raise a smile or two, especially if it's filled with bottles of fizz!

This handy tote bag is a perfect companion to the Just Married personalised cushion in our wedding range, which fits snuggly inside. See related items to check this listing for a special price when bought together.

Screenprinted by hand in our London studio with waterbased inks onto strong canvas cotton.

Gentle hand wash only.

Flat measurements - 52cm (w) x 40cm (h) with a 13cm gusset

Stuffed with goodies - 38 x 40 x 13cms

Long handles for easy carrying.

name: Just Married Souvenir Tea Towel
description:
A fun 'Just Married' tea towel keepsake for the happy couple on their special wedding day.

Has a little woven hanging loop with the words 'to have and to hold' sewn into the top.

A great eco friendly gift you can wrap up a bottle of champagne with and present on their wedding day.

Makes a fun, last minute surprise to add to the main present from the wedding list.

A lovely keepsake and happy reminder for Mr and Mrs as they dry the dishes for years to come!

Comes neatly folded and packed in a cellophane wrap with red ribbon tie and manilla tag.

Hand screen printed in my London studio on to a super quality, crisp white linen.

Hand or machine wash 30 degrees C

The tea towel measures approx. 48 x 76cm

name: Tube Light, Shapes and Things
description:
These cute little shades are just the ticket for little ones.  Displays a variety of shapes and things for inquisitive minds.  Printed in white or black on translucent laminated tissue paper.

Dotted stitched detail surrounds the shapes for added sparkle!

Weighted at the bottom, these stand well as lights in their own right.

Shade: W: 13cm H: 30cm
Max 40W bayonet fitting with an inline switch on white flex
Ideal for low energy bulbs

name: No. 8 ABC Shade
description:
Perfect for a small children's room/playroom.  
Covers the whole alphabet, numbers one to nine and six shapes. 
Screen printed by hand with individual machine stitching for dotted detail.
Diameter: 20cm H: 24cm
Max 60W/E14

A lovely crisp white onto translucent laminated paper
Also available in the larger No.12 Drum

name: No. 8 Drum Shade Shapes and Things
description:
An extra special gift for your little one, this beautiful pendant lampshade for nursery or playroom is screenprinted by hand with machine stitched detail.

Childrens lighting packed with personality, this sweet drum shade presents a collection of imagery inspired by vintage books and nostagic toys. You'll find animals, stars, cars, trains and more each surrounded with a twinkle of dotty detail.

Alternated with lots of shapes for your child to identify. A lovely educational and fun lampshade to explore and enjoy together at bedtime.

The neutral palette of this pretty lampshade sits well with any nursery colour scheme making it an ideal new born baby gift for girls and boys and is great for sharing.

Available in two shapes to suit the size of your child's bedroom.

No. 8 drum shade for small or medium sized rooms with average ceiling height.
See the other listing for the larger No.12 drum shade.
Also comes with a matching tube light for those special bedtime stories - please see my other listings

Printed in white onto translucent laminated fine paper.

The white print is more opaque than the paper - making a lovely contrast light once lit.

All materials are made and printed in the UK

Comes wrapped in cellophane and well packed in a sturdy box using eco freindly packaging.

Dimensions:
Small Lampshade: Diameter: 20cm H: 24cm Max 60W

Fits all UK standard and continental pendant light fittings.

name: No. 12 Drum ABC Choice of Colours
description:
A lovely fun shade based on the wooden counting blocks I collected for my little boy. Perfect for a children's room/playroom, an educational slant which covers the whole alphabet, numbers one to nine and six shapes. 
Screen printed by hand with individual machine stitching for dotted detail.
Diameter: 30cm H: 20cm / 12" x 8"
Max 100W/E14
Available in 5 colourways 
Also available in the smaller No. 8 Drum

If the colour you want isn't in stock, please email me.

name: No. 12 Drum Shade Shapes and Things
description:
*not ready for dispatch until 5th November*

An extra special gift for your little one, this beautiful pendant lampshade for nursery or playroom is screenprinted by hand with machine stitched detail.

Childrens lighting packed with personality, this sweet drum shade presents a collection of imagery inspired by vintage books and nostagic toys. You'll find animals, stars, cars, trains and more each surrounded with a twinkle of dotty detail.

Alternated with lots of shapes for your child to identify. A lovely educational and fun lampshade to explore and enjoy together at bedtime.

The neutral palette of this pretty lampshade sits well with any nursery colour scheme making it an ideal new born baby gift for girls and boys and is great for sharing.

Available in two shapes to suit the size of your child's bedroom.

No.12 light shade for medium to large rooms or high ceilings. See other listing for the smaller No. 8 shade.

Printed in white onto translucent laminated fine paper.

The white print is more opaque than the paper - making a lovely contrast light once lit.

All materials are made and printed in the UK

Comes wrapped in cellophane and well packed in a sturdy box using eco freindly packaging.

Dimensions:
Diameter: 30cm H: 20cm / 12" x 8" Max 100W

Fits all UK standard and continental pendant light fittings.

name: Retro Alphabet Cushion
description:
A fab ABC counting cushion, great for scattering around the nursery or playroom, brightening up a child's world with its large, vintage block typography.

Has the full alphabet and numbers 1 to 9. Inspired by all the lovely, vintage wooden blocks kicking about our home!

This fun, educational cushion makes a lovely children's gift to cuddle up with at bedtime and help with letter learning and counting at any time.

Printed by hand using water based solvent free inks in our London studio

Choose from a variety of bright and neutral colours for little boys and girls.

Plain Reverse
Supplied with a feather insert

Please note that for delivery outside UK the pillow inserts are not available to purchase.

Made from:
A lovely unbleached half panama cotton: Gentle hand wash only.

Has a concealed side zip.

Dimensions:
45cm / 18" square

*made to order*
Please allow 10-14 days prior to delivery.

name: Personalised Name Cushion
description:
Simple and sweet, say it with a word or two. A cute little cushion for someone special. Screenprinted by hand and unique to you.

A lovely gift for every occasion, christenings, newborns, weddings, Valentine's, Mother's Day, Father's Day or just a fun birthday surprise.

Choose any words you like and it doesn't just have to be a name - Super Mum, Mummy, Grandma Rocks, Dad is King. Add a special date if you like - it's up to you!

Your personalised cushion is presented in a cellophane wrap with a ribbon tie and manilla tag - ready to gift

The cushion is enclosed in a polyfil pad. This is a fixed pillow with no opening.

Write your chosen name for your printed cushion in a message on purchase. Maximum 18 letters (can be one name on one row only with star underneath - maximum 9 letters per line - see photos) If you'd rather have something else instead of the star - a heart, & or + or nothing at all, please let me know
If you choose to have a date - it will be printed in the format 05.03.13 with dots in between as pictured.

Available in a variety of colours.

Plain natural cotton reverse.

If you'd like a print on the reverse such as the owl, monkey or lion, please see my other listings.
Made from:
100% unbleached half panama cotton.

Screen printed by hand in my London studio, using solvent free, water based inks.

A very eco friendly gift!

Dry clean or gentle handwash. Do not spin. Warm iron whilst slightly damp.

Dimensions:
The cushion is 30cm/12" square.

This item is made to order as each printed name is unique to you. Please allow 10-14 days delivery. If you need it for a specific date - please let me know.

name: Child's Personalised Birthday Cushion
description:
A happy little cushion complete with your child's name, birthday and favourite character, screenprinted by hand in a choice of colours for boys and girls.

Each cushion is individually screen printed by hand and made in our London studio.

Character - choose from owl, lion or monkey 

Personalise with a first name and birthday - Please write the date as 07.10.12 format in message when purchasing. You can also just have two names with a star in the middle or one name with the star underneath.

Colours are: Aqua blue, Candy Pink, Purple, Orange, Red or Yellow- please leave your choice in the message. If you'd like another colour, please send a request.

Your cushion will be wrapped in a cellophane bag with curly ribbon tie and manilla tag, ready to write your own message and present as a gift.

Made from100% unbleached half panama cotton and hand printed using non toxic water based inks.

Comes with a polyfil pad - this is a fixed pillow with no opening

Care instructions: Gentle hand wash, do not spin, dry flat. Warm iron whilst slightly damp.

30cm / 12" square

This item is made to order as each printed name is unique to you. Please allow 10-14 days delivery. If you need it for a specific date - please let me know.

name: Cheeky Monkey Personlised Cushion
description:
A cheeky smiling monkey on one side and your child's name on the other. An eco friendly personalised cushion, screenprinted by hand onto unbleached half panama cotton.

This happy cushion would make a super gift for a new born baby.

Great for children with two names or a middle name to be proud of! Otherwise you could choose a nick name such as CHEEKY CHARLIE or HAPPY HARRY, or something fun and unique to your little one.

Comes neatly presented in a cellophane wrap with curly ribbon tie and manilla tag ready to write your own message and give as a gift.

Write your chosen name for your printed cushion in the message option when purchasing. Maximum 18 letters plus the star (can be one name on one row only with star underneath - see photo)
9 letters per line only.
Otherwise you can have one name and a date - see my other listing for examples

Available in a choice of colours. The front and back will be the same colour.

Printed by hand in our London studio, using solvent free, water based inks.

A very eco friendly gift!

The cushion is enclosed in a polyfil pad. This is a fixed pillow with no opening.

Dry clean or gentle handwash. Do not spin. Warm iron whilst slightly damp.

The cushion is 30cm/12" square. 

This item is made to order as each printed name is unique to you. Please allow 10-14 days delivery. If you need it for a specific date - please let me know.

name: Personalised Owl Print Cushion
description:
A sweet hand printed cushion, personalised with a name of your choice on one side and a little woodland owl on the reverse.

A lovely gift for a new born baby, a birthday present for nieces, nephews and grand children or as a special christening gift.

Your personalised cushion is presented in a cellophane wrap with a ribbon tie and manilla tag - ready to gift for christenings, birthdays or even weddings!

The cushion is enclosed in a polyfil pad. This is a fixed pillow with no opening.

Write your chosen name for your printed cushion in the message option when purchasing. Maximum 18 letters plus the star (can be one name on one row only with star underneath - maximum 9 letters per line - see photos) You can also choose a name and a birth date - see my other listing.

Chose from candy pink or aqua blue or purple. Other colours available on request - please choose from the many colours found in my shop and send me a request.

100% unbleached half panama cotton.

Printed by hand in my London studio, using solvent free, water based inks.

A very eco friendly gift!

Dry clean or gentle handwash. Do not spin. Warm iron whilst slightly damp.

The cushion is 30cm/12" square.

This item is made to order as each printed name is unique to you. Please allow 10-14 days delivery. If you need it for a specific date - please let me know.

name: Baby Owl Screenprint Cushion
description:
A sweet little owl sits amongst a parade of stars and spots on this screenprinted children's cushion.

A perfect present for owl lovers everywhere - big and small. Makes an ideal new born baby gift for the nursery for little boys and girls. Great for nieces, nephews and grand children.

The reverse is plain organic cotton.

(made to order, please allow 5-7 days prior to shipping)

Your cushion will arrive in a cellophane wrap with a ribbon tie and manilla tag, ready to gift.

Choose from candy pink, aqua blue or purple

Other colours available on request. Choose from my alphabet cushion range and send me a message request.

Made from:
Unbleached 100% half panama cotton. Printed by hand in my London studio, using solvent free, waterbased inks

Gentle hand wash only, do not spin. Warm iron whilst slightly damp.

Owl cushion measures 30cm/12" square.

Comes with a polyfil pad. This is a fixed cushion with no opening.

This item is made to order as each printed name is unique to you. Please allow 10-14 days delivery. If you need it for a specific date - please let me know.

name: Shapes and Things Nursery Cushion
description:
This sweet little cushion makes a colourful addition to the nursery or children's room. It has an array of images for your child to enjoy.

Inspired by all the things that children love: planes, trains, cars and lorries, animals, birds, flowers and more. Alternated with plenty of shapes for little ones to discover and learn, this happy little cushion would make an ideal new baby or birthday gift for both boys and girls.

Your cushion will come wrapped in cellophane, tied with a curly ribbon tie and matching manilla tag, ready to gift.

Lampshades and night lights are also available in this design - please see my other listings. Makes a great combination with our big ABC cushions too.

Hand screen printed on both sides in a choice of four colours:
Orange, Pink, Green and Royal Blue

Made from:
100% unbleached half panama cotton

Printed by hand in our London studio, using solvent free, waterbased inks.

Comes with a polyfil pad. This is a fixed pillow with no opening.

Hand wash warm. Careful iron whilst slightly damp.

Dimensions:
30cm /12" square. A cute size for kids to cuddle!
Also available in a large 45cm version - see listings.

This item is made to order as each printed name is unique to you. Please allow 10-14 days delivery. If you need it for a specific date - please let me know.

name: Large Nursery Print Cushion
description:
This gorgeous big cushion holds a menagerie of creatures, shapes and everyday things appealing to the curiousity of all children, boys and girls alike.

Matches the smaller Shapes and Things cushion.

Help your child to find the robin, the lion, the bear, the triangle, the car, the train, the plane and many more. A lovely big cushion to snuggle up with mum or dad for the bed time read - makes a great back rest for the big guys too!

This educational and fun print pillow would make a super addition to the nursery or playroom, perched on the bed or scattered about the floor.

Available in grassy green, bright red, orange, candy pink or royal blue. Other colours available on request.

Printed on one side only with a plain reverse. Can be made with the print on both sides - additional £7 - please email your request 

Comes with a 45cm feather cushion pad.
Please note - orders outside the UK do not include the pad.

I can also make up a larger 56cm / 22" cushion available as a cushion cover only.

Complete the look with our bestselling Shapes and Things Nursery Lampshade or mix and match with our other cushion designs as seen in the photos - please see our shop for more

Printed by hand on a lovely strong 100% half panama, unbleached cotton using water based inks. Has a concealed side zip.

Gentle hand wash or dry clean only.

45cm / 18" square

This item is made to order as each printed name is unique to you. Please allow 10-14 days delivery. If you need it for a specific date - please let me know.

name: Alphabet Personalised Letter Sack
description:
This super huge letter sack, is great for storing toys or collecting the laundry.

Also makes a large Christmas stocking for Santa's present delivery service!

A giant eco friendly storage sack with plenty of uses all year round and perfect for a quick tidy up! It's just big enough to store a double duvet or a mountain of toys.

Pick a letter each for the whole family!

Screenprinted by hand with the letter of your choice on the front and plain reverse.

This big canvas bag has double drawstring ties, complete with hanging loop.

Available in a variety of colours for children and adults, boys and girls: Mulberry, Olive, Royal Blue, Lilac, Pink, Orange and Green, Elephant Grey and Red

Also available with an alphabet print reverse - see my other listing.

Made from:
Chemical free strong cotton canvas.

Gentle hand wash. Some shrinkage may occur with first wash. Will soften with age.

Screen printed by hand using waterbased solvent free inks in our London studio.

76 cm (h) x 60cm (w)

Printed area measures approx 30cm square.

name: ABC Super Size Toy Sack
description:
A super huge storage sack, great for storing toys galore. Throw in the softies, collect the laundry and hang it up to enjoy!

Screenprinted by hand with the full alphabet and numbers 1 to 9 for your child to follow and learn. Inspired by vintage wooden stacking blocks, this charming sack will add a touch of nostalgia to any playroom or nursery

A giant sack that comes in really handy at Christmas for filling up with presents! Once the festive season is over, this useful storage bag is great for holding plenty of stuff all year round. Use it for tidying up in a hurry or storing all the kids' laundry, even big enough for a sack race across the living room!

Choose from four lovely bright colours: blue, pink, green and red plus graphic black. More colours available if required - see our letter sack listing.

Have it personalised with a big letter of your choice on the reverse (£5 extra) so the kids can have one each in their favourite colour.

Comes in a clear cellophane wrap with curly ribbon tie and manilla tag, ready to write your own Christmas or Birthday message.

Made from:
Strong unbleached canvas with double drawstring ties, complete with hanging loop.

Waterbased solvent free inks and chemical free cotton canvas.

Gentle hand wash

As with natural cotton, slight shrinkage may occur with first wash.

Dimensions:
60cm (w) x 76 cm (h)

Printed ABC area measures aprox 45cm square. Letter square is approx. 28cm
